alert.note: Alert for Western Grant (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 18 at 11:01PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...First Accumulating Snow for Allegheny Mountains... Snow showers are expected for locations along and west of the Allegheny Front in Garrett and western Grant Counties. Temperatures already at or below freezing, will cause snow to accumulate on most surfaces. Snowfall accumulations of 1 to 3 inches along the western slopes are expected, with the highest accumulations expected above 2500 feet. The highest coverage of snow showers is forecast to be late tonight through midday Wednesday, and accumulating snow may impact the Wednesday morning commute.
